## Getting Started with LINQ

- [Getting Started with LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/getting-started-with-linq.md): Learn more about: Getting Started with LINQ in Visual Basic

- [Basic Query Operations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/basic-query-operations.md): Learn more about: Basic Query Operations (Visual Basic)
- [Visual Basic Features That Support LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/features-that-support-linq.md): Learn more about: Visual Basic Features That Support LINQ
- [Type Relationships in Query Operations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/type-relationships-in-query-operations.md): Learn more about: Type Relationships in Query Operations (Visual Basic)
- [Walkthrough: Writing Queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/walkthrough-writing-queries.md): Learn more about: Walkthrough: Writing Queries in Visual Basic
- [How to: Create a List of Items](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-create-a-list-of-items.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a List of Items

## LINQ and File Directories

- [LINQ and File Directories](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-and-file-directories.md): Learn more about: LINQ and File Directories (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for Files with a Specified Attribute or Name](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-files-with-a-specified-attribute-or-name.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for Files with a Specified Attribute or Name (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Group Files by Extension (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-group-files-by-extension-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Group Files by Extension (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for the Total Number of Bytes in a Set of Folders (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-the-total-number-of-bytes-in-a-set-of-folders.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for the Total Number of Bytes in a Set of Folders (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Compare the Contents of Two Folders (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-compare-the-contents-of-two-folders-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Compare the Contents of Two Folders (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for the Largest File or Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-the-largest-file-or-files-in-a-directory-tree.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for the Largest File or Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for Duplicate Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-duplicate-files-in-a-directory-tree-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for Duplicate Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to query the contents of files in a folder (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-the-contents-of-files-in-a-folder-linq.md): Learn more about: How to query the contents of files in a folder (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query an ArrayList with LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-an-arraylist-with-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Query an ArrayList with LINQ (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Add Custom Methods for LINQ Queries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-add-custom-methods-for-linq-queries.md): Learn more about: How to: Add custom methods for LINQ queries (Visual Basic)

## LINQ and Strings

- [LINQ and Strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-and-strings.md): Learn more about: LINQ and Strings (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Count Occurrences of a Word in a String (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-count-occurrences-of-a-word-in-a-string-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Count Occurrences of a Word in a String (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for Sentences that Contain a Specified Set of Words (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-sentences-that-contain-a-specified-set-of-words.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for Sentences that Contain a Specified Set of Words (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Query for Characters in a String (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-query-for-characters-in-a-string-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Query for Characters in a String (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to combine LINQ queries with regular expressions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-combine-linq-queries-with-regular-expressions.md): Learn more about: How to combine LINQ queries with regular expressions (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Find the Set Difference Between Two Lists (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-the-set-difference-between-two-lists-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Find the Set Difference Between Two Lists (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Sort or Filter Text Data by Any Word or Field (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-sort-or-filter-text-data-by-any-word-or-field-linq.md): Learn more about: How to: Sort or Filter Text Data by Any Word or Field (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Reorder the Fields of a Delimited File (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-reorder-the-fields-of-a-delimited-file.md): Learn more about: How to: Reorder the Fields of a Delimited File (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
